title.reduced: Full Game - Dreamfall The Longest Journey

description.full: An Xbox 360 hard drive is required to use this item  Players: 1. GAME-PLAY ALERT: This game has been fully tested to successfully play on your Xbox 360 console. However, in some cases, you may see some minor irregularities with audio/video for brief periods. For more details, see www.xbox.com/xboxoriginals. Dreamfall: The Longest Journey was awarded "Best Xbox Game of the Year" by Gamespot and is widely recognized as one of the most spectacular adventure games ever made. Take on the role of Zoë Castillo and travel through locations all over the world, from Casablanca to Tokyo, as you unravel an epic story filled with memorable characters, beautiful locales and challenging puzzles. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
